word: JESUS RETURNS IN GLORY SURROUNDED BY A CLOUD OF ANGELS.\97With anthems of celestial melody the holy angels, a vast unnumbered throng, attend Him on His way. The firmament seems filled with radiant forms\97\93ten thousand times ten thousand, and thousands of thousands.\94 No human pen can portray the scene; no mortal mind is adequate to conceive its splendor. . . . As the living cloud comes still nearer, every eye beholds the Prince of life. No crown of thorns now mars that sacred head; but a diadem of glory rests on His holy brow. His countenance outshines the dazzling brightness of the noonday sun. . . .
